DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine if BMS-663513 administered in combination with ipilimumab to patients with advanced malignant melanoma is safe and tolerable
DOC.brief_title: Combination of Anti-CD137 & Ipilimumab in Patients With Melanoma
DOC.criteria: Histologically or cytologically confirmed malignant melanoma Stage III (unresectable) or Stage IV disease which may have been treated with up to one prior cytotoxic chemotherapy and/or up to 3 other therapeutic regimens Willing to undergo up to 3 biopsies of an accessible lesion Active/symptomatic brain metastases Primary ocular melanoma or primary tumor of unknown origin Concurrent autoimmune disease Previous treatment with a CD137 agonist or CTLA4 inhibitor
